Experiences

Basic Algorithm Practicum Assistant

Supervise the course at lab and give some clue for students task. Hereafter, give score to their task. At the end of the semester, I was tasked for guide them in their final assignment.

Machine Learning Lecturer Assistant

Check and give score for machine learning task. The task is about clustering and classification for set of data. Sometimes, I will teach student at class but depend on lecturer needs.

Web Development Study Group

This activity held by Basisdata Lab. In this activity i learng how to develop a website. Here I learned how to make website from zero. At the front-end i learn how to use html, css, javascript and bootstrap. At the back-end i learn how to use express js and MongoDB.

Big Data (Data Engineer) Study Group

This activity held by Basisdata Lab. In this activity i learn Big Data from Data Engineer's side. I learned how to make data faster to process. Also I learned how to use virtual machine, hadoop and other Data Engineer things.
